dmca.title: copyright infringement by your user, www.securiour.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: James J. Lippard [mailto:lippard@discord.org] 
Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2007 2:46 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: James J. Lippard
Subject: copyright infringement by your user, www.securiour.com

Your user has a blog which has taken content from other blogs, including
mine, for commercial use without permission.

My blog is copyrighted under a Creative Commons license which is
restricted to noncommercial use and which require
proper attribution to the author.

The following blog posts appear on your customer's site without my name:

"Contrasting Christian responses to Clark Adams' death"
http://www.securiour.com/index.php/1676

"Christian radio station's part in Catalina Island fire"
http://www.securiour.com/index.php/1192

I request that you please take down these pages as per the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act.

I certify that I am the copyright owner of the content on these pages
under penalty of perjury.

-- 
Jim Lippard        lippard@discord.org       http://www.discord.org/
GPG Key ID: 0xF8D42CFE
